title: Selecting a "Tendered" C activates the E-sign button other wise it should be disabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in a club
AND user can view the Add C widget
AND there is at least one Add C in Tendered state
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a Tendered Add C
custom_expected: THEN the e-sign button becomes enabled

title: Clicking E-sign will trigger a modal asking the user to confirm if they want to proceed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a Tendered Add C
AND clicks E-sign
custom_expected:
THEN a modal pops up asking the user if they want to proceed
Wireframe: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_add_cs_for_e-signature

title: Hitting CANCEL will close the modal and stop the e-sig process
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Add C widget
AND that user has selected an Add C in Tendered State
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks E-sign
AND user clicks Cancel
custom_expected: THEN the modal will close and the Add C will not be submitted for E-Sig

title: Hitting 'Submit for E-signature' will for now just close the modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Add C widget
AND that user has selected an Add C in Tendered State
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks E-sign
AND clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN the modal closes

title: Verify user can select all players in a widget and tender
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Add C widget
AND User filters all addendum C's to preliminary
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks "Select all" checkbox
AND has a greater number than 100 of selected addendum C's
AND clicks tender
custom_expected: THEN All addendum C's that have no issues are tendered

title: Verify user can select all players in a widget and submit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Add C widget
AND that user has selected over 100 Add C in Tendered State
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks submit
custom_expected: THEN all addendum c's without issues are submitted.

title: Warning is triggered if a C submitted for e-sig has date populated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND user selects and Add C that has the Date Signed field populated
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the Add C for e-signature
custom_expected:
THEN the confirmation modal appears
AND it contains a warning
AND the text is
"Body: Date Signed has already been entered.
Hint: E-Signature will update this to the date the player E-Signs."

title: Verify warning appears for each applicable player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND user selects and Add C that has the Date Signed field populated
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the Add C for e-signature
custom_expected: THEN the confirmation modal will show a warning for each player the warning applies to

title: Verify "Submit for E-signature" button is enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the Add C for e-signature
custom_expected:
THEN the confirmation modal appears
AND the "Submit for E-Signature" button is enabled

title: If user hits Cancel, process is stopped and warning icons appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user submits the Add C for e-signature
AND the confirmation modal appears
AND the user hits "Cancel"
custom_expected:
THEN the e-sign process is stopped
AND the modal is closed
AND warning icons appears next to the affected players in the widget

title: Verify that if a add c does not have authorized signatory field populated, hard error appears.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has a tendered Add C
AND that C does not have the Authorized Signatory field populated
custom_steps: WHEN user submits C for e-sig
custom_expected: THEN hard error is triggered

title: Verify that if authorized signatory chosen doesn't have a stored signature on the auth sig widget, hard error appears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has a tendered Add C
AND the chosen Authorized Signatory does not have a signature store in the Auth Sig widget
custom_steps: WHEN user submits C for e-sig
custom_expected: THEN hard error is triggered

title: Verify that the error message is correctly worded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user submits a C for e-sig
AND that C does not have an Auth. Sig. assigned
custom_steps: WHEN the error message appears
custom_expected:
THEN the error message will be:
Error: Please select an Authorized signatory who has a stored signature to continue with E-signature
Hint: You can add and update signatories on the Authorized Signatory widget

title: Verify that the words "Authorized Signatory widget" are linked to the location of this widget.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has submitted a C for e-sig
AND that C does not have an Auth. Sig. assigned
custom_steps: WHEN the error message appears
custom_expected: THEN the words "Authorized Signatory widget" are in the text

title: Verify that each player that the error applies to also receives the warning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has submitted more than one C for e-sig
AND those Cs does not have an Auth. Sig. assigned
custom_steps: WHEN the error message appears
custom_expected: THEN the message appears for each player without an assigned signatory

title: Verify that "Submit for e-signature" button is not available and displays the error/warnings on the widget when user is forced to close dialogue box.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has submitted more than one C for e-sig
AND those Cs does not have an Auth. Sig. assigned
custom_steps: WHEN the error message appears
custom_expected:
THEN the "Submit for E-Signature" button is not available 
AND after closing the warning the error icons will be visible in the widget

title: Verify that if State signed field isn't populated if country is set to USA, hard error appears
Verify that if country signed and city signed fields are not populated and e-sign button is hit, hard error appears
Verify that error matches wireframe
custom_expected: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings

title: Verify that for each player that receives this warning it shows for every player
Verify that "Submit for e-signature" button is not available and displays the error/warnings on the widget when user is forced to close dialogue box.
Warning is triggered when a C submitted for e-sig already has attachments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND has a C in tendered state
AND that C already has an attachment
custom_steps: WHEN the user submits this Add C for e-signature
custom_expected: THEN a warning appears in the confirmation modal

title: Verify warning text
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND that user has submitted a tendered C for e-signature
AND that C already has attachments
custom_steps: WHEN the warning appears in the confirmation modal
custom_expected: THEN it reads as follows: An attachment already exists for this form with the label "[label]"

title: Verify warning appears for each player it applies to
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND that user has submitted a tendered C for e-signature
AND that C already has attachments
custom_steps: WHEN the warning appears in the confirmation modal
custom_expected: THEN it appears for each player that already has attachments

title: Verify button appears allowing clubs to ignrore and continue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND that user has submitted a tendered C for e-signature
AND that C already has attachments
custom_steps: WHEN the warning appears in the confirmation modal
custom_expected: THEN the user can ignore warnings and continue with e-sig submission

title: Verify Cancel button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND that user has submitted a tendered C for e-signature
AND that C already has attachments
custom_steps: WHEN the warning appears in the confirmation modal
custom_expected: THEN a Cancel button appears and the user can use it to return to the widget

title: Verify name and title sections are pre-populated by the system on the PDF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has an Add C in tendered state
AND that C has an Auth. Sig. with a valid signature on file
custom_steps: WHEN user prints the selected C
custom_expected: THEN the name and title sections on the PDF will be pre-populated

title: The Name must match the chosen Name in the Club Signatory field on the Addendum C widget. It should be in the order "First Last"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has an Add C in tendered state
AND that C has an Auth. Sig. with a valid signature on file
custom_steps: WHEN user prints the selected C
custom_expected: THEN the name section will match that of the authorized signatory assigned to that Add C

title: The Title must match the entered title in the Authorized Signatory widget for the chosen Name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has an Add C in tendered state
AND that C has an Auth. Sig. with a valid signature on file
custom_steps: WHEN user prints the selected C
custom_expected: THEN the title section will match that of the authorized signatory as it appears in the Auth. Sig. widget

title: Introduce a new widget titled "Player E-signature"
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user views tabs on the home dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN user sees "E-signature" tab to the right of the Clipboard tab
AND user can click this tab to view the "Player E-Signature" tab

title: The widget should have the following columns:
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Player E-Signature widget
custom_expected:
THEN the widget has the following columns: 
Player Name
Player ID
Form Type
Date submitted for E-sig

title: Verify default population of widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Player E-Signature widget
custom_expected: THEN default population for this widget should be all forms that are currently waiting in E-signature state, have a player signature required and have not yet gotten the player e-signature for that club. For now this would just be the Addendum Cs

title: Verify Player column is frozen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Player E-Signature widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks views Player column
custom_expected: THEN the Player column is frozen

title: Verify player name should be Last name, First name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Player E-Signature widget
custom_expected: THEN the players' names are listed as Last Name, First Name

title: Form type should say "Addendum C" for Add Cs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Player E-Signature widget
custom_expected: THEN Form Type will say "Addendum C" for Add Cs

title: Date submitted should the show the date the form went to e-sign state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Player E-Signature widget
custom_expected: THEN the Date Signed column shows the date the form went to e-sign state

title: Widget should have all global features working- refresh, maximize, export, quick filter
Widget should be secondary sorted by player id on initial load
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Player E-Signature widget
custom_expected: THEN that widget will be secondarily sorted by player ID

title: Verify that once E-sign button is clicked, modal appears with loading indicator and PDF is being generated
Verify CLOSE and "X" button close modal
Verify that there is a column on the Player E-signature widget with an e-sign icon on the Frozen column to the left of player
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_expected: THEN there is a column on the Player E-signature widget with an e-sign icon on the Frozen column to the left of player

title: Verify Club can click on the icon to bring up the PDF for player to e-sign. After this, the club hands the device over to the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_expected: THEN the e-sign icon is clickable

title: Verify Player is guided by the Adobe echo sign interface. The player will need to be guided to typing their name and drawing their signature.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the e-sign icon
custom_expected: THEN the user is prompted by the Adobe Echosign interface

title: Verify that Adobe should insert the signature on the PDF at the space above the line which is reserved for the Player's signature
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player has clicked e-sign on the Player E-Signetures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN a player completes the echosign process
AND a user prints out the PDF of their Add C
custom_expected: THEN the player's signature will be populated on the PDF

title: Verify Once the player finishes the Adobe process, the PDF is closed and player hands back device to club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has clicked e-sign next to a player on the Player E-signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the player completes the Adobe process
custom_expected: THEN the PDF is closed

title: Verify The form now drops off the Player E-signature widget. (Note: The next story makes this an automatic process but for now, its fine to only work on manually refresh)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has submitted a selected a player for e-signature from the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user completes the process
custom_expected: THEN the player's name will be dropped from the widget

title: Verify that this workflow must work on on all screen sizes
Introduce a new widget titled "Club E-signature"
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "E-Signature" tab in the upper-right
custom_expected:
THEN the user can scroll down and see the "Club E-Signature" widget with the following columns:
Signatory
Player
Player ID
Form Type
Submitted for E-sig
Signed by Player

title: Verify default population of widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can see the Club E-signatures widget
custom_expected:
THEN the default population of the widget is players:
-- currently waiting in E-signature state,
-- have a club signature required,
-- the club signatory has a stored sig on Auth sig widget
-- have not yet gotten the club e-signature

title: Verify default column sorting
custom_preconds: GIVEN that player can view the Club E-signatures widget
custom_expected: THEN that column is sorted by Signatory's name by default

title: Verify players are listed as Lastname, Firstname
Verify "Submitted" shows the date the form went to e-sign state
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has submitted a C for e-signature
custom_expected: THEN the "Club E-Signature" widget's "Submitted" column shows the date that C was submitted for e-signature

title: Verify "Signed by Player" date
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the "Club E-Signatures widget"
custom_expected: THEN the "Club E-Signature" widget's "Signed by Player" column shows the date that C was signed by the player

title: Widget should have all global features working
Verify that when the form has been submitted to adobe and player e-sig widget, Upload/attach icon switches to e-sign icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Add C widget
AND the form has been submitted to Adobe
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a tendered Add C
AND clicks the E-Sign button
AND clicks "close" on the following modal
custom_expected: THEN the upload/attach icon changes to a pen icon

title: Verify hitting Save on a form in e-sig state prompts a soft error
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has a form in e-sig state
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects that form
AND clicks the edit icon
AND makes some change
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN a soft error dialogue box appears

title: Verify appearance of the error
custom_preconds: GIVEN that soft error appears on save
custom_expected:
THEN the error should appear as:

**Body:** You are attempting to update this form while E-signatures are in the process of being collected.
**Hint:** If you continue, it will clear all E-signature progress and you will have to start again.
**Buttons:** [Ignore and Continue][Cancel]

http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings

title: Verify that the warning appears for each player that triggers the error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has selected multiple forms in e-sign state
AND saved changes to those forms
custom_steps: WHEN the soft error modal appears
custom_expected: THEN it should list each player affected

title: Verify that clicking cancel does not save changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has selected a form in e-sign state
AND edited the form
AND clicked save
custom_steps:
WHEN the warning modal appears
AND the user clicks cancel
custom_expected:
THEN the changes made to the row are not saved
AND the row is still in edit mode

title: Verify that clicking "ignore and continue" saves changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has edited a form in e-sign state
AND saved
custom_steps:
WHEN the warning modal appears
AND the user clicks "Ignore and Continue"
custom_expected: THEN  the changes will be saved

title: Verify that if PDF is withdrawn pen icon reverts to upload icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has edited a form in e-sign state
AND saved
AND the warning modal appears
AND the user clicks "Ignore and Continue"
custom_expected: THEN the status icon reverts to the upload icon

title: Verify that user can resubmit a withdrawn form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has saved changes to a form previously in e-sig state
AND that form is withdrawn
custom_steps: WHEN user re-selects the form
custom_expected: THEN user can re-submit for e-sig

title: Veirfy that withdrawn form no longer appears in Player or Club E-sig widgets
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a player has edited a form in e-sig state
AND saved
custom_steps: WHEN the form is withdrawn form e-sig state
custom_expected: THEN the form no longer appears in Player or Club E-sig widgets

title: Verify that The Player's date signed field on the PDF must be auto-populated by Adobe with the date that the player signed.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a tendered C has been submitted for e-sig
custom_steps:
WHEN a player signs from the Player E-sig widget
AND returns to view the form in the multi-C widget
custom_expected: THEN the date-signed field should automatically be populated with the date signed

title: Verify that the player is not able to edit the date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has signed a submitted C
AND the form is in Pending status
custom_expected: THEN the date-signed field is not editable

title: Verify that when a form appears on the player e-sig widget, the font is bold
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has submitted a form for E-sign
custom_steps: WHEN that form appears on the Player E-signature widget
custom_expected: THEN the font is bold

title: Verify that once the PDF has been launched, the widget auto-updates and the font is no longer bold
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has a form in the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens that PDF
custom_expected: THEN the widget automatically updates the font of that form to regular

title: Verify that after about 5 mins from signing, manually refreshing updates population
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has signed a form from the Player Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user waits 5 minutes and refreshes the widget
custom_expected: THEN the form will no longer appear in the widget

title: Verify that a row does not revert to bold upon refreshing
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a user has opened a form from the Player Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user refreshes the widget
custom_expected: THE form does not revert to a bold font

title: Verify that All steps starting from logging in, to bringing up the player e-sig widget to launching and signing the PDF must work on a tablet sized device.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a user is logged to Ebis on a mobile device3
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs in
AND views the player e-sig widget
AND launches a PDF
AND signs
custom_expected: THEN the PDF will be signed and there will be no bugs or issues that did not appear on a PC.

title: Verify that Any widgets that are located on the same page as the e-sig workflow should not look broken but need not be usable on a tablet
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in to ebis on a mobile device
custom_steps: WHEN the user goes through the e-sig workflow
custom_expected: THEN any widgets that are not used but are on the same page as the workflow do not look broken on a tablet

title: Verify that if both club and player have signed the Addendum C, the C updates to "Pending".
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a player has signed his Addendum C
AND that THE club has signed his C
custom_steps: WHEN the user returns to the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the status of that form is shown as "Pending"

title: Verify that rule checks are not ran during this process
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a player has signed his Add C
AND a club has signed his C
custom_steps: WHEN player submits for approval
custom_expected: THEN no rule checks are run

title: Verify Once a player has placed his signature on an Addendum C, the system populates and saves the "Date Signed" field on the Tendered Add C automatically.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player has signed his Addendum C from the Player Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the date signed field will automatically be updated

title: Verify that the date matches the date the Player signed the C
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player has signed his Add C
custom_steps: WHEN the Date Signed field is automatically updated
custom_expected: THEN the date matches the date that the player signed his form

title: Verify The Date signed field continues to be editable to the clubs in Tendered state.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player has signed his Add C from the Player Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the form on the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the Date Signed field is still editable

title: Verify population of widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Club Signatures widget
custom_expected: THEN the widget's population will be all forms whose players have signed them already

title: Add a checkbox column to the widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Club E-Signature widget
custom_expected: THEN there should be a checkbox next to each entry

title: Selecting a checkbox should enable the STAMP SIGNATURE button
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a user is viewing the Club E-signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects one or more of the checkboxes
custom_expected: THEN the "Stamp Signature" button is enabled

title: When no checkboxes are selected, button should be disabled
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing the club E-signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user has not selected any checkboxes
custom_expected: THEN the Stamp Signature button is disabled

title: Hitting Stamp Signature should insert the club's pre-stored signature into the PDF in the area above the line reserved for the club's signature. There is no need to open the PDF for the user
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a user has checked a form in the Club E-signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits "Stamp Signature"
custom_expected: THEN the club's pre-stored signature should be stamped on the PDF above the line for the club's signature.

title: If the stamping was successfully complete, show a notification saying "X document(s) successfully E-Signed" and the form falls off the Club e-signature widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club has successfully stamped a form
custom_expected:
THEN a notification saying "X documents succesfully E-Signed" appears
AND the form falls off the Club e-signature widget

title: If for any reason, the stamping process isn't successful, show an error modal (using global framework) with the error:
custom_expected:
**Title:**  Error
**Body:** Stamping of club signature failed.
**Hint:** Please try again or contact the BOC
**Button(s):** Close

title: In the process of stamping a club's signature in story #108265284, the club's date signed field on the PDF should be automatically populated with the date of the stamping
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club has signed an Add C from the Club E-signatures widget
custom_expected: THEN the club's date signed field on the PDF should automatically be populated with the date of the stamping

title: The date should be in the format of Mon. DD, yyyy
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club's signing date is added to the PDF
custom_expected: THEN its format should be month-dd, yyyy

title: Verify E-Signed PDFs should now appear as a paper clip icon in the attachments column on the Addendum C widget.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player and club have e-signed an Add C
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the form in the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the PDF appears as a paper clip icon in the attachments column

title: Verify Similar to uploaded PDFs, the e-signed PDFs should open up on clicking the paper clip, following the same behavior as the uploaded PDFs
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a form has gone through the e-sig process
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the paperclip for the PDF of that fom
custom_expected: THEN the PDF downloads, following the same behavior as uploaded PDFs

title: Verify that User should be able to see the E-signatures of the player and club as well as the Date signed field for both on the PDF
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user opens a PDF of a completed and e-signed form
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able to see the club and player signatures as well as the dates signed.

title: Hitting Stamp Signature should insert the club's pre-stored signature into the PDF for all of the selected rows.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a user has multiple forms in the Club E-signature widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects more than one of those forms
AND hits the Stamp Signature button
custom_expected: THEN the club's pre-stored signature should be added to the PDF for all of the selected forms

title: System should use the stored signature of the signatory for each row. In other words, if user selects rows for different signatories, system should stamp the appropriate stored signature for that row.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has stamped multiple forms
AND those forms use different club signatories
custom_expected: THEN each PDF should have the correct signatory populated

title: The club's date signed field on the PDF should be automatically populated with the date of the stamping
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user has e-signed multiple forms
custom_steps: WHEN the user stamps those forms with a club signatory
custom_expected: THEN each PDF should show the date stamped by the club

title: f the stamping was successfully complete, the forms fall off the Club e-signature widget and a notification is shown "x document(s) were successfully E-Signed"
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has e-signed multiple forms
custom_steps: WHEN the user stamps the club signature on them
custom_expected:
THEN the forms fall off the Club E-signature widget
AND a notification appears: "x document(s) were successfully E-Signed"
